data.name: Cool People Club
data.detailed_description:
Cool People Club is a 3D Bullet Hell Adventure.

STORY
Plate, Duck, and Sock come across a Cool Contest - a contest in which the winner is granted a wish. However, the winner of this contest is determined by combat, and our heroes might just be in over their heads. Are you cool enough to lead them to victory?

FEATURES
  • Play as 3 different characters, each with their own attacks & quirks.
  • Encounter many foes with unique attacks, projectiles, and styles.
  • Fight powerful bosses.
  • Earn cool badges.
  • Choose your fate...
data.about_the_game:
Cool People Club is a 3D Bullet Hell Adventure.

STORY

FEATURES

data.short_description: Join the Cool People Club in an epic quest to prove their coolness to the world! Dodge bullets, fight powerful foes, and determine your fate in this surreal 3D bullet hell adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
